Reference

Referendum data

rfrnds()

Get referendum data

rfrnd()

Get a single referendum's data

download_file_attachment()

Download file attachment

add_rfrnds()

Add new referendums to the C2D database

edit_rfrnds()

Edit existing referendums in the C2D database

delete_rfrnds()

Delete referendums in the C2D database

validate_rfrnds()

Validate referendum data

count_rfrnds()

Count number of referendums

search_rfrnds()

Search in English referendum titles

Referendum metadata

data_codebook

C2D Codebook

val_lbls()

Get the set of possible value labels of a referendum data variable

v_vals()

Get the set of possible values of a referendum data variable

printify_v_names()

Convert referendum data variables to their printable version

Tags

Functions to work with referendum tags.

data_tags

Tag hierarchy

tags()

List available tags

hierarchize_tags()

Hierarchize tags

hierarchize_tags_fast()

Hierarchize tags (fast)

infer_tags()

Infer higher-tier tags

Augmentation

Functions to augment the C2D referendum data by additional information (columns).

add_period()

Add period to referendum data

add_turnout()

Add turnout to referendum data

add_world_regions()

Add UN world regions to referendum data

Transformation

Functions to transform the C2D referendum data into other shapes, each with a specific purpose.

n_rfrnds_per_period()

Count number of referendums per period

printify_col_names()

Printify referendum data column names

Visualization

plot_rfrnd_share_per_period()

Referendum share per period stacked area chart

plot_tag_segmentation()

Tag segmentation sunburst chart

plot_tag_share_per_period()

Tag share per period stacked area chart

Tabulation

tbl_n_rfrnds_per_period()

Tabulate number of referendums per period

C2D API Status

is_online()

Test C2D API availability

sudd.ch scraping

Functions to scrape the data from the sudd.ch database.

list_sudd_territories()

List referendum territories from sudd.ch

list_sudd_titles()

List referendum titles from sudd.ch

list_sudd_rfrnds()

List referendum data from sudd.ch

sudd_rfrnds()

Get referendum data from sudd.ch

Miscellaneous

pkg_config

c2d package configuration metadata
